subject: Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Sir,
Send me your phone number so that I can call you we talk on the phone.
Waiting for your urgent reply
Best regards,
Dr. Koko Michael

subject: Re:   Dear Sir,
body:
Dear Dr. Koko Michael,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I appreciate your eagerness to talk on the phone. However, before we proceed, could you please provide me with more information about the purpose of our conversation? It would be helpful to know what topics or subjects we will be discussing.

Looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Curtis
